data.title: Park near the 5th Arrondissement of Paris
data.meta_description: Park in the 5th Arrondissement of Paris at the best price with Parclick!
data.text:
The 5th arrondissement is located on the left bank of the Seine, south of the Île de la Cité and Ile Saint-Louis and is located in the centre of Paris. If you are looking to park in the 5th arrondissement of Paris, we advise you to reserve a parking space with Parclick to guarantee your parking space and save you the stress and the expense of parking in the centre of Paris.

For non-residents it is difficult to park in the area as on-street parking is limited to two consecutive hours for visitors, and one hour of parking will cost you €4. Parclick offers the perfect solution, reserve your parking space in Paris, in the 5th arrondissement in one of our many cheap, secure car parks. It couldn’t be easier!

The 5th Arrondissement

Officially The Pantheon District

The 5th arrondissement of Paris encompasses the oldest part of the capital. It is home to one of the most famous areas of Paris, the Latin Quarter. There are 4 districts which make up the 5th arrondissement: Saint-Victor, Jardin-des-Plantes, Val-de-Grâce and Sorbonne. In addition to the Seine to the north, the 5th district is surrounded by four major streets: Boulevard Saint-Michel to the west and Boulevard de Port-Royal, Boulevard Saint-Marcel and Boulevard de l'Hôpital to the south.

This district includes some of Paris’ most famous universities such as the Pierre and Marie Curie University (Jussieu campus), the Institut du Monde Arabe, the Sorbonne and the École Normale Supérieure de Paris (ENS). You can also visit many churches, such as the Saint-Médard, Saint-Séverin and the Val-de-Grâce Church. Finally, the 5th arrondissement también includes the Arena of Lutetia, The Val-de-Grâce Army Training Hospital, the Great Mosque of Paris, the Pantheon and the Jardin des Plantes.

Whether you are studying in Paris or visiting, the 5th arrondissement is an area that you can’t miss. Located next to the Jardin des Plantes you will also find several renowned museums, such as the National Museum of Natural History.

If you're planning on driving to the 5th arrondissement with your own car, you may find it difficult to park - especially around Boulevard Saint-Germain, Rue Mouffetard, or the Quai Saint-Bernard and Quai de la Tournelle. Parclick is the perfect solution for parking in the 5th arrondissement without difficulty. Whether you're studying, eating out near rue Mouffetard or visiting the Jardin des Plantes... You'll get more out of your stay in Paris by knowing your car is safe in a 5th arrondissement car park.
